coding_cpp.name: coding_cpp
coding_cpp.description: An implementation of a C++ challenge, with an external seed file.
coding_cpp.author: Loic Ortola (contact@loicortola.com)

coding_java.name: coding_java
coding_java.description: An implementation of a Java challenge, with an external seed file.
coding_java.author: Loic Ortola (contact@loicortola.com)

coding_postgresql_ro.name: coding_postgresql_ro
coding_postgresql_ro.description: A Challenge skeleton for PostgreSQL, with a side-loaded sql file. This challenge allows to perform select statements (read only).
coding_postgresql_ro.author: Loic Ortola (contact@loicortola.com)

coding_postgresql_rw.name: coding_postgresql_rw
coding_postgresql_rw.description: A Challenge skeleton for PostgreSQL, with a side-loaded sql file. This challenge allows to perform schema & db changes (read & writes).
coding_postgresql_rw.author: Loic Ortola (contact@loicortola.com)

coding_python.name: coding_python
coding_python.description: An implementation of a Python challenge, with an external seed file.
coding_python.author: Loic Ortola (contact@loicortola.com)
